At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is your best next step?  
choose:  
A. I turn left and go up.  
B. I descend and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward, then turn right.  
D. I turn right and descend.  
E. I rotate the camera downward.
